content: Clear out the archers as best you can and look for some Fragrant Jade Flowers to harvest (plus a green Wisp to absorb on the far side of the upper ridge) before dropping down to the bottom floor of the structure.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rock Clash Platform'.
The content is as follows:
Clear out the archers as best you can and look for some Fragrant Jade Flowers to harvest (plus a green Wisp to absorb on the far side of the upper ridge) before dropping down to the bottom floor of the structure.
